x_symbol.description: A simple modal dialog box object.

par.name: sDialogId
par.note: ID string or element reference of the outer container of the "dialog box".

meth.name: show
meth.note: Displays the "grey" element and then displays the dialog on top of it and in the center of the window.

meth.name: hide(dialogOnly)
meth.note: Hides both the dialog and the "grey" elements by positioning them "off-screen". if dialogOnly is true then the grey element will not be hidden, but it will return to its previous z-index.

rev.author: mf
rev.note: Made some changes to support having a Confirm dialog (see the demo). Please note that this object is likely to get re-implemented at some time.
